info.title: HTML Server Report
info.description: Creates an asynchronous server report in HTML format according to user request.

method.name: addContent
method.description: Adds a content report to the report stack.

parameter.name: $content
parameter.description: The body of the report content.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The content's type. See class constants. It is CONTENT_DATA by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder where the content will be inserted in the DOM. It's a CSS selector. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: Defines whether the content will replace the existing or will be appended. See class constants. It is REPLACE_METHOD by default.

method.name: getReport
method.description: Builds the entire report with the head and the body and returns the html generated.

method.name: getReportContent
method.description: Creates a report content as a DOMElement inside the report.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The content's type. See class constants. It is CONTENT_DATA by default.

parameter.name: $holder
parameter.description: The holder where the content will be inserted in the DOM. It's a CSS selector. Empty by default.

parameter.name: $method
parameter.description: Defines whether the content will replace the existing or will be appended. See class constants. It is REPLACE_METHOD by default.

method.returndescription: The report content array for the server report.

method.name: setModuleResource
method.description: Adds a header to the report indicating the module being loaded.
